mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, François Jean, Marquis de Chastellux, Paris, to Philip Schuyler, 1784 June 17
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: François-Jean de Beauvoir, chevalier de Chastellux, 1734-1788
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Chastellux writes of the departure of the Marquis de Lafayette to America. He imagines the scene if he, instead of Lafayette, might return to America and visit with Washington. He reminisces about the weeks spent at Albany & Saratoga during the Revolution and follows with a postscript regarding Madam Carter now Madam Church. Autographed letter signed, 3 pages.
